$interpreted: Nolva: This is strange...
Izumi: What an adorable marionette~
Nolva: ... T, thank you. Her name is Lillian. I made her.
Izumi: Hello, Lillian~
Izumi: Are you a marionette maker?
Nolva: Yes. I am a vendor at the market in Paradise Prairie.
Izumi: Market? Then why are you here on the borders of Atlas?

Nolva: A customer's delivery.
But, I've been waiting here a while. Nobody's shown up.
Nolva: I was just wondering what I should do...
Izumi: ...... You people disturbed me.
Bodyguard Goon: Bro, this girl has such a cute face~
Bodyguard Goon: B, but her eyes are so terrifying, Eeeeek...
Bodyguard Leader: Idiot, you can't lose your footing before the fight even starts!
Nolva: You guys are... the bodyguards of the customer who ordered a delivery from me before?
Bodyguard Goon: Hmph, you were tricked.

Bodyguard Goon: Our employer detests Atlas survivors.
You better behave yourself and leave the market immediately. We don't want to dirty our hands.
Izumi: ...... What if she refuses?
Bodyguard Leader: Then we will bury you guys alive right here!
Izumi: Hoho, that sounds like fun~
Izumi: Take your best shot, boys~
Nolva: ...... Thank you. But... why would you help me?
Izumi: Because I like Atlas marionettes.
Nolva: ....... T, that's the only reason?
Izumi: Welp, I am often described as unpredictable~
Izumi: Then, I'll be on my way. Got somewhere I need to visit ASAP~
Nolva: Where are you going...
Nolva: Could it be... you're going to Atlas!?
Nolva: You can't. Atlas is extremely dangerous to begin with. After the castle fell, there have even been rumors...
Izumi: That's exactly why I need to go in and take a look~
Nolva: No. It's too dangerous!
Izumi: What a troublesome girl...
Izumi: Hey, can you come out and tell her to stop!
Izumi: Hoho, so my speculation was on point.
Izumi: In this day and age~ after being stuck in a human's body for too long, even monsters get their own consciousness~
Izumi: Woah, no need to be so tense~ I said before, I like Atlas marionettes~ Sidenote, it must be pretty tough for you as well.
Izumi: Farewell~
Nolva: ...... Eh? I fell asleep again?
Nolva: Ah, where is that person?

Model.Text: This is strange...
What an adorable marionette~
... T, thank you. Her name is Lillian. I made her.
Hello, Lillian~
Are you a marionette maker?
Yes. I am a vendor at the market in Paradise Prairie.
Market? Then why are you here on the borders of Atlas?

A customer's delivery.
But, I've been waiting here a while. Nobody's shown up.
I was just wondering what I should do...
...... You people disturbed me.
Bro, this girl has such a cute face~
B, but her eyes are so terrifying, Eeeeek...
Idiot, you can't lose your footing before the fight even starts!
You guys are... the bodyguards of the customer who ordered a delivery from me before?
Hmph, you were tricked.

Our employer detests Atlas survivors.
You better behave yourself and leave the market immediately. We don't want to dirty our hands.
...... What if she refuses?
Then we will bury you guys alive right here!
Hoho, that sounds like fun~
Take your best shot, boys~
...... Thank you. But... why would you help me?
Because I like Atlas marionettes.
....... T, that's the only reason?
Welp, I am often described as unpredictable~
Then, I'll be on my way. Got somewhere I need to visit ASAP~
Where are you going...
Could it be... you're going to Atlas!?
You can't. Atlas is extremely dangerous to begin with. After the castle fell, there have even been rumors...
That's exactly why I need to go in and take a look~
No. It's too dangerous!
What a troublesome girl...
Hey, can you come out and tell her to stop!
Hoho, so my speculation was on point.
In this day and age~ after being stuck in a human's body for too long, even monsters get their own consciousness~
Woah, no need to be so tense~ I said before, I like Atlas marionettes~ Sidenote, it must be pretty tough for you as well.
Farewell~
...... Eh? I fell asleep again?
Ah, where is that person?
